Canola oil and its effects on breast cancer

Summary generated using: $shovel3 query.concatConclusions 'breast cancer canola oil site:ncbi.nlm.nih.gov' 40 includeReference=True
  • Substituting canola oil for corn oil is an easy dietary change for people to make; such a change to the maternal diet may decrease risk for breast cancer in the daughter.
